::Primal Prime::

    He could see the confusion in her eyes. He decided to=
 explain.
    "Optimus Prime was basically the first carrier of the Autobot=
 Matrix of Leadership. He fought in the great war, and was on the Ark. Then=
 he was killed by Megatron, the original one.
    "I awakened on Earth not =
knowing who I was. Hot Rod helped me discover who I really am. I have been =
trying to remember more about my past.
    "I am not the leader of the Maxi=
mals, nor do I really want to be. But I was once a great leader, I also thi=
nk it would be better if the leader of this base stayed, just in case Megat=
ron decides to attack. Also, the mention of my name might just help in the =
conferences."
